title: Model Article
content:
1. IntroductionThis is a display test article designed to preview how different elements render in the Hexo Butterfly theme.
It helps you check:

Typography and spacing
Dark / light mode appearance
Code blocks and syntax highlighting
Images, lists, tables, and quotes
Special components and alerts


2. Headings TestH1 HeadingH2 HeadingH3 HeadingH4 HeadingH5 HeadingH6 Heading
3. Text FormattingNormal text looks like this.
Bold textItalic textStrikethrough textInline code

This is a blockquote.It is often used for notes or important remarks.

5. Code Block TestPythondef hello():    print("Hello, Butterfly Theme!")hello()

Bashhexo cleanhexo generatehexo server

C / C++#include <stdio.h>int main() {    printf("Display test\n");    return 0;}

HTTPGET /v1/status HTTP/1.1 Host: api.example.com User-Agent: Hexo-Butterfly-Test Accept: application/json Connection: close

C#using System;class Program {    static void Main(string[] args) {        Console.WriteLine("Hello, Butterfly Theme! background background background background background background background");    }}

This article can be reused after future upgrades to quickly verify:

Happy blogging.
